channel.title: [pi] thieivng more then one item from the one stall [pi]
channel.description:
hey guys, i added a thieving stall and i wish to make it so i can thieve 3 items from it. right now when i thieve from it i only get one item which is manta rays. here my code
code [select] case 4876: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(391, 5000, 1);//Sea Turtles c.getThieving().stealFromStall(389, 7000, 20);//manta rays c.getThieving().stealFromStall(385, 10000, 100);//sharks break;

item.title: [pi] thieivng more then one item from the one stall [pi]
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

hey guys, i added a thieving stall and i wish to make it so i can thieve 3 items from it.
right now when i thieve from it i only get one item which is manta rays.
here my code

code [select]
case 4876:
c.getThieving().stealFromStall(391, 5000, 1);//Sea Turtles
c.getThieving().stealFromStall(389, 7000, 20);//manta rays
c.getThieving().stealFromStall(385, 10000, 100);//sharks
break;

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] thieivng more then one item from the one stall [pi]
